simplified: 瓜田不纳履，李下不整冠
traditional: 瓜田不納履，李下不整冠
pinyin: gua1 tian2 bu4 na4 lu:3 , li3 xia4 bu4 zheng3 guan1

definitions.gua1 tian2 bu4 na4 lu:3 , li3 xia4 bu4 z: lit. don't tie your shoelaces in a melon patch, and don't adjust your hat under a plum tree (idiom); fig. don't do anything that might arouse suspicion; innocent acts may be misconstrued;
